title: Sales Performance Analysis
prompt:
Analyze this quarterly sales data and provide insights:

| Quarter | Product A | Product B | Product C | Marketing Spend |
|---------|-----------|-----------|-----------|----------------|
| Q1 2023 | $125,000  | $89,000   | $156,000  | $45,000        |
| Q2 2023 | $142,000  | $95,000   | $134,000  | $52,000        |
| Q3 2023 | $138,000  | $112,000  | $145,000  | $48,000        |
| Q4 2023 | $165,000  | $128,000  | $167,000  | $58,000        |

Calculate growth rates, identify trends, and recommend which product to focus marketing efforts on. Include ROI analysis.

expected_analysis.marketing_roi: Calculation of revenue per marketing dollar
expected_analysis.recommendation: Focus on Product B due to highest growth rate

evaluation_criteria.data_accuracy: Mathematical precision in growth rates and ROI
evaluation_criteria.insight_quality: Meaningful business insights beyond basic calculations
evaluation_criteria.presentation: Clear tables, charts, or structured analysis
